titleStmt.title: Gods vvarning to His people of England, by the great overflowing of the waters or floudes lately hapned in South-Wales and many other places vvherein is declared the great losses and wonderfull damages that hapned thereby, by the drowning of many townes and villages to the vtter vndooing of many thousandes of people.
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, of Usk.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Barley and Io. Bayly, and are to be solde in Gratious Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
